snippet: Just because you can come up with a theoretical justification for a policy doesn't make it a good idea.
abstract: Just because you can come up with a theoretical justification for a policy doesn't make it a good idea.
lead_paragraph: Since writing Sunday's column, I've read a lot of defenses of the Obama White House's decision to force religious institutions to cover contraception, sterilization and the morning-after pill, and this post from Kevin Drum captures the gist of nearly all of them:
